name: airflow
description: A MCP Server that connects to [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) using official python client.

AIRFLOW_HOST.description: URL of your Apache Airflow instance

tools.name: get_value
tools.description: Get a specific option from configuration

tools.name: get_dag_details
tools.description: Get a simplified representation of DAG

tools.name: clear_task_instances
tools.description: Clear a set of task instances

tools.name: set_task_instances_state
tools.description: Set a state of task instances

tools.name: reparse_dag_file
tools.description: Request re-parsing of a DAG file

tools.name: get_dag_run
tools.description: Get a DAG run by DAG ID and DAG run ID

tools.name: update_dag_run_state
tools.description: Update a DAG run state by DAG ID and DAG run ID

tools.name: delete_dag_run
tools.description: Delete a DAG run by DAG ID and DAG run ID

tools.name: get_upstream_dataset_events
tools.description: Get dataset events for a DAG run

tools.name: get_dag_dataset_queued_event
tools.description: Get a queued Dataset event for a DAG

tools.name: get_dag_dataset_queued_events
tools.description: Get queued Dataset events for a DAG

tools.name: delete_dag_dataset_queued_event
tools.description: Delete a queued Dataset event for a DAG

tools.name: delete_dag_dataset_queued_events
tools.description: Delete queued Dataset events for a DAG

tools.name: get_dataset_queued_events
tools.description: Get queued Dataset events for a Dataset

tools.name: delete_dataset_queued_events
tools.description: Delete queued Dataset events for a Dataset

tools.name: get_event_logs
tools.description: List log entries from event log

tools.name: get_event_log
tools.description: Get a specific log entry by ID

tools.name: get_import_error
tools.description: Get a specific import error by ID

tools.name: get_plugins
tools.description: Get a list of loaded plugins

tools.name: get_task_instance
tools.description: Get a task instance by DAG ID, task ID, and DAG run ID

tools.name: list_task_instances
tools.description: List task instances by DAG ID and DAG run ID

tools.name: update_task_instance
tools.description: Update a task instance by DAG ID, DAG run ID, and task ID
